Articles.Content: I'm a beginning modder. I've made a working fuel tank, and a decoupler. Can anyone point me towards a tutorial for creating an engine? Is it the same as any other part, just with moduleEngine (or whatever it is)? If so, how do you do the fairing?

A good source of info in general - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638)

Go down a ways and there are links for most types of parts - not sure how up to date they are though.
